description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Wonder what the elves do after Christmas? Find out now when you play An Elfy Winter! Up to 4 players and 4 unique game modes. Fun for one or fun for all!
